Constructs a sentinel.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/default initialization|Default-initializes]] the underlying sentinel object {{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}}.
@2@ Conversion from {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Move constructs the underlying object {{tti|inner_}} with {{c|1=std::move(i.inner_)}}.
@3@ [[cpp/language/value initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying object {{tti|inner_}} with {{c|inner}}. This constructor is not accessible to users.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|a {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}}}}
{{par|inner|an underlying object of type [[cpp/ranges/zip_transform_view#Member types|{{tti|zentinel}}]]{{c/core|&lt;Const&gt;}}}}
{{par end}}
